rules.title: Update Kanban as we work
rules.description: Real-time updates throughout sessions, not at the end. Keeps us honest and gives visibility on progress.

rules.title: Strict no-drift policy
rules.description: One task at a time. If something else 'could be improved', flag it for the backlog rather than diving in. No side quests.

rules.title: Don't touch working code
rules.description: If something works, leave it alone unless there's a specific, justified reason to change it. 'Working' beats 'theoretically better'. Remember the roof assembly incident (2026-01-28).
